thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Modern with elegance
thread.title_full: Modern with elegance - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Matt P
title: Modern with elegance
text: I stayed at the Renwick last minute one night during the work week and was pleasantly surprised. The Renwick is everything you would expect from a boutique"ish" New York City modern luxury hotel. The rooms are spacious, clean, and well planned. The architecture in the lobby is beautiful as well as every piece in the rooms. The paintings are beautifully done and displayed and the attention to detail that was given to something even as small as the pencil holder is incredible. It is refreshing to know that people still take pride in small details that some customers see before seeing anything else. Staff was friendly, helpful and professional. This is a must stay!
